snippet.textDisplay: I just finished this chapter and I keep being amazed how awesome this game is, and I love the fact they show different sides of the story and the same locations before and after. the game constantly keeps me surprised and exploring. I had the same feeling with superstar saga and golden sun, (man i love the gba!)

snippet.textDisplay:
It's been about a year since I last played through Mother 3. This music still makes me unbearably sad.

It's time to re-play it.

snippet.textDisplay: Well it may be the original name, but Fassad is actually a more fitting translation than merely putting Yokuba.  According to a quick search, Yokuba roughly translates to excessive greed in Japanese.  Giving him the name Fassad, IE facade, is in my opinion a good idea.  Facade may not be the same as greed, but both describe his character... and Greedo would sound like a Star Wars reference, even if it would be a more accurate translation.
snippet.textOriginal: Well it may be the original name, but Fassad is actually a more fitting translation than merely putting Yokuba.  According to a quick search, Yokuba roughly translates to excessive greed in Japanese.  Giving him the name Fassad, IE facade, is in my opinion a good idea.  Facade may not be the same as greed, but both describe his character... and Greedo would sound like a Star Wars reference, even if it would be a more accurate translation.
